price: isang mabuting-loob sa mga magulang niya, at hindi naging isang palasupil na masuwayin.[307]
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ وَلَمۡ يَكُن جَبَّارًا عَصِيّٗا
footnotes: [307] sa Panginoon niya at mga magulang niya

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidayhi walam yakun jabbāran ʿaṣiyyan
